body: Introduction to logic design and digital systems. Boolean algebra, and introduction to combinatorial and sequential circuit design and analysis.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: NONE)(Additional Attributes: Honors)

title: CMPEN 271H: Introduction to Digital Systems
